parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description:
The instance ID.

>  The database instance must be an ApsaraDB RDS for MySQL instance or a PolarDB for MySQL cluster.

parameters.name: ItemId
parameters.description: The ID of the throttling rule that is applied to the instance. You can call the [GetRunningSqlConcurrencyControlRules](~~223538~~) operation to query the ID.
